Welcome to City of Boston!


This email includes the password for the AccessBoston account has been created for:$firstName $lastName


Password:$userPassword


This password will be needed in order to login to their AccessBoston account for the first time.  It is a temporary password and the system will walk $firstName $lastName through creating a permanent password for their account once they login.


The other required account information was sent in a separate email.


Sincerely,  AccessBoston


Please Note: this is an auto-generated email, please do not reply to this email. Questions should be directed to the DoIT Service Desk via 617-635-7378 or  BPS Technology Help Desk  at 617-635-9200.
